name: SpotOn Software Pvt. Ltd.
tagline: One Stop Shop for Mobile Application Development
description:
SpotOn's customers use its solutions and services to expand existing customer base of the product/s, to enter new markets, improve efficiency, create exciting marketing tools and realize high ROI - Without having to build and sustain a costly in-house mobile division.
A complete offering of Mobile and Server side integration expertise, proven track record with global customers, Get-It-Done attitude and uncompromising quality are the pillars of SpotOn's strength.
Be it Rapid prototyping, Complete product outsourcing or Staff augmentation, we cater to your needs to reduce your engineering risks & time to market.
Come to SpotOn Software and add growth & ubiquity to your product portfolio.
